channel.title: Highcharter on Michael Khoo
channel.description: Recent content in Highcharter on Michael Khoo

item.title: Cyrptocurrency Prices and Google Trends Data
item.description: Introduction Blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies have come front and center as the market’s total market capitalization closes in on the $800 billion mark as writing this, growing over ~4300% since 2017 with much of the growth happening in recent months. With all the recent news on the subject, I thought it might be interesting to try to quantify the buzz against the cryptocurrency price data and how search interest may correlates with price swings.

item.title: NBA 2016-17 Backcourt Tandems - A Brief Look
item.description: Introduction In recent years the NBA has been shifting to favor guard-oriented play highlighted by dynamic pairs such as the Golden State Warriors’s Steph Curry and Klay Thompson and the Wizard’s John Wall and Bradley Beal just to name a few.
